info.description:
==================================================================

Please note: this project has been renamed in newer versions. See

https://pypi.python.org/pypi/reahl-tofu for the newer versions.

==================================================================

A testing framework that couples fixtures and tests loosely.

Tofu is a testing framework, like unittest, or the {J,Py,S}unit
family.

Tofu differs from these test frameworks in that it allows you to have
a hierarchy of test fixtures that is *completely* decoupled from your
hierarchy of tests or test suites.
info.name: tofu
info.summary: A testing framework that couples fixtures and tests loosely
